content: this bag is the one that can go with you everywhere quick and easy to crochet it can be made up in an evening and filled right away use it as a unique wrapping for a hostess gift with a bottle of wine and some napkins or fill it with baby items for an anticipated new arrival it can carry a load of groceries store vegetables outside the fridge hold the kids toys tote your beach stuff or hang in the shower to hold toiletries let your imagination loose as you find new uses for this durable and unique carry-all it uses 500 feet of doit mason twine and a size i crochet hook
